name: MonWeb Toy
description:
Use your mouse to interact with your pet cactus monster! Use left and right arrow keys for the minigame!

This game takes inspiration from three things from my childhood.

First, the little cactus character is based on a Pokemon-like monster I made as a kid.

Second, the food menu is reminiscent of when I would draw a menu on a sheet of paper and pretend it was a food truck for my stuffed animals to order from xD

And third, the overall gameplay stems from my lifelong desire to make a game similar to Neopets!

Thanks for playing :)
